item.description:
Wow!! - a Wine Tasting with 4 course dinner at CW's Chops N Catch for only $40.00!!  No info on the web, posters are in Manchester restaurants and libraries. So here is the info I have:  4 course dinner, each course paired with an Australian wine (1-Salad, 2-Surf & Turf Appetizer, 3-Main course - choice of Haddock & clams or Filet Mignon both with veggie & starch, 5-Dessert).  *Seating is at 6:30, 1st course served at 7:00pm.

This is a new restaurant, (where Nulli's was) and everyone who has eaten here has loved the food  including me.  For more info and a detailed description of the evening's menu please call the restaurant after 4:00pm (860) 783-5545

IMPORTANT: SEATING IS VERY LIMITED - ONLY R.S.V.P. "YES" IF YOU WILL BE THERE!! Please do not change to a "NO" after FRIDAY 4/8/11 5:00pm.

website:  http://chopsandcatch.com/ 

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: CW'S CHOPS N CATCH Wine Dinner 4/11 @ 6:30pm
